title: Stablecoins and the double standard of money
description: Stablecoins are judged not according to the standards applied to banks, but to an idealised benchmark no private money has historically achieved without public support: perfect convertibility at all times, in all conditions, without institutional backing. Biagio Bossone’s historical analysis provide...

title: Fed cuts: 'Weaker job growth and lower inflation’ could push Powell to reduce interest rates
description: U.S. markets are closed today for Thanksgiving, but S&P 500 futures were flat by midnight after the index closed up 0.69% yesterday, its fourth straight day of gains. Investors appear satisfied with the index’s current position, just 1% below its recent all-time high. Asian and European markets were...
